clubs.mockNotice: *Currently displaying mock data - Real club locations coming soon

about.title: About German Cannabis Clubs
about.description: Cannabis Social Clubs in Germany are part of the country's new cannabis policy. These non-profit associations allow members to collectively cultivate and distribute cannabis for personal use, providing a regulated alternative to the illicit market.

legal.title: Legal Updates
legal.subtitle: Stay informed about cannabis legislation in Germany
legal.noUpdates: No legal updates available at this time

possession.title: Possession
possession.content: Adults may possess up to 25 grams in public and up to 50 grams at home. Home growing of up to three plants per adult is permitted.

consumption.title: Consumption
consumption.content: Public consumption is allowed, but not near schools, sports facilities, or in the presence of minors.

driving.title: Driving
driving.content: Driving under the influence is strictly prohibited and subject to penalties.

clubs.title: Cannabis Clubs
clubs.content: Non-profit associations are permitted to grow and distribute cannabis to members only.

startLow.title: Start Low, Go Slow
startLow.content: Begin with a low dose, especially with edibles, and wait for effects before consuming more.

knowSource.title: Know Your Source
knowSource.content: Obtain cannabis from legal, reliable sources to avoid contaminants and unknown potency.

mindset.title: Set and Setting
mindset.content: Use in a comfortable environment with trusted people when in a positive mindset.

hydration.title: Stay Hydrated
hydration.content: Drink plenty of water and avoid mixing with alcohol or other substances.

compounds.title: Key Compounds
compounds.content: THC (psychoactive), CBD (non-psychoactive), and terpenes (aromas) are the main active components.

methods.title: Consumption Methods
methods.content: Smoking, vaporizing, edibles, tinctures, and topicals each have different onset times and effect durations.

types.title: Cannabis Types
types.content: Indica (relaxing), Sativa (energizing), and Hybrid strains offer different effects and therapeutic properties.

tolerance.title: Tolerance
tolerance.content: Regular use can build tolerance requiring higher doses for the same effect. Taking breaks can reset sensitivity.

offline.title: Offline Access
offline.noSavedItems: No items saved for offline access
